title: Watch dogs Update 2 (v 1.03.471) plus dlc's English repack
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by MR DJ (Me)

Repack features:
- Ripped only languages except English,, Subtitles: English ;
- Final game version (1.03.471 - Update 2) plus previous Hotfix patch applied ;
- Precracked - install and play;
- Install Time - 20minutes
- Crack based on RELOADED

Watch dogs runs on x64 systems only,,update 2 fixed FPS,stability & major bugs ;

Dlc's included:

White Hat Pack - Four Exclusive Missions
 The Palace Pack - ATM Hack Boost and Investigation Bonus
 Signature Shot Pack - Viceroy Outfit and Biometric Rifle
 Breakthrough Pack - Vehicle Expert Perk
 Blume Agent Theme Pack
 Club Justice Theme Pack
 White Hat Theme Pack 

**INSTRUCTIONS:

This is my 1st repack guys,, since my setup files are 'unknown' at the moment ,, disable ur antivirus just before running the setup otherwise it will give some ShellExecuteEx/Access violate address error but the setup will still be opened with some error prompts as the antivirus may find the files suspicious,, same is with the uninstaller...

For eg.,, I have avast antivirus,, since I have compiled the game's setup using inno setup compiler,,when I launch setup,, avast deep screen causes some error prompt as it see's it as a suspicious file.... before setup,,disable the 'deep screen' by opening the avast interface,,click on settings,,go to antivirus and then uncheck the enable deep screen,, for others, simply disabling the antivirus before running the setup will do,, dis is perhaps the case of false positive for which i'll submit my files to the antivirus centre....

NO BUGS,, NO ISSUES,, NO VIRUSES,, ALL MY TORRENTS ARE CLEAN....

Run setup,, Select the necessary software(direct x and visual c++) provided in Redist folder ,,install the game,, Play from desktop.....

ENJOY AND SEED......
